Uses of Interface
org.eclipse.jface.text.source.ISourceViewerExtension

  • Packages that use ISourceViewerExtension 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.jface.text.source
    Provides a framework for connecting document regions with annotations and for displaying those.
    org.eclipse.jface.text.source.projection
    This package provides the UI part for projection documents of which the most important part is the projection viewer.
    org.eclipse.ui.console
    Application programming interfaces for interaction with the Eclipse console.

    • Uses of ISourceViewerExtension in org.eclipse.jface.text.source

      Classes in org.eclipse.jface.text.source that implement ISourceViewerExtension 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  SourceViewer
      SWT based implementation of ISourceViewer and its extension interfaces.

    • Uses of ISourceViewerExtension in org.eclipse.jface.text.source.projection

      Classes in org.eclipse.jface.text.source.projection that implement ISourceViewerExtension 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ProjectionViewer
      A projection source viewer is a source viewer which supports multiple visible regions which can dynamically be changed.

    • Uses of ISourceViewerExtension in org.eclipse.ui.console

      Classes in org.eclipse.ui.console that implement ISourceViewerExtension 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  TextConsoleViewer
      Default viewer used to display a TextConsole.
